title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Drops 5.7% as Index Trades Lower From Wednesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polygon (POL) joined NEAR Protocol (NEAR) as an underperformer, falling 5.6%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3216.65, down 2.4% (-79.51) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BTC (-0.9%) and LTC (-1.8%).

Laggards: NEAR (-5.7%) and POL (-5.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index is trading lower with no assets in positive territory, and specific cryptocurrencies showing significant declines of 5.7% and 5.6%.
